parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (11240015), which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda, as it's a mandatory identifier for campaign materials in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Andrei Plujar, identifying him as a candidate for the 2024 Parliamentary Elections.  This directly satisfies Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This fulfills the requirement of Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to promote Andrei Plujar's candidacy. The phrasing "Pe 1 Decembrie TU alegi cine vrei să fie vocea ta pentru Caraș-Severin!" ("On December 1st YOU choose who you want to be your voice for Caraș-Severin!") directly encourages voters to choose him. This strongly suggests an electoral objective, satisfying Article 36 (7) - c. The mention of his position on the list further emphasizes this objective.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic content. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it focuses solely on promoting the candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clearly structured promotional message for a political candidate.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1665040587725701</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Andrei Plujar), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the exact end date is not specified, the context suggests it's within the campaign period), has a clear electoral objective (promoting Plujar's candidacy), and is targeted at the general public via a paid Facebook advertisement. The presence of the CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Andrei Plujar</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
USR Caraș-Severin, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1665040587725701) cu scop electoral, care promovează candidatura lui Andrei Plujar la alegerile parlamentare din 2024, folosind un limbaj persuasiv ("Pe 1 Decembrie TU alegi cine vrei să fie vocea ta pentru Caraș-Severin!") și un număr CMF (11240015),  având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea candidatului menționat. Postarea, fiind o reclamă plătită pe o platformă publică, se adresează unui public larg și depășește limitele activității jurnalistice obiective.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
